channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A ‘New Star’ Suddenly Got 3 Million Times Brighter — How To See It
item.description: A new naked-eye star called V462 Lupi has appeared in the constellation Lupus and is visible across parts of North America in what is likely a once-in...

item.title: The Wiretap: Google AI Is At The Center Of An Iran-Israel Disinformation War
item.description: Google's Veo 3 video and photo AI generation tool is being used in information warfare in the Iran-Israel conflict.

item.title: Samsung Reveals Free Offer For Galaxy Z Fold 7 And Z Flip 7 Buyers
item.description: We now know the place and date for the biggest Samsung unveil of the fall, and there’s even a free offer to tempt you to buy.

item.title: AI Generated Pro-Iran Propaganda Is Flooding TikTok, Instagram And YouTube

item.title: Four Ways To Sync Your LED Smart Lights To Music
item.description: Color LED smart lights that react to music are now hugely popular. Here are four ways to get your LED-party started.
